reviewText: This one is one of our favorites.  Too bad the older VHS videos got cut shorter.  I'm sure there was lots left out but it's still good.

I was able to get this video tape of the '93 Tattoo with the help of customer service at Music Scotland, where I bought a DVD of the 2013 Tattoo----Having witnessed the 1993 Tattoo with my two grandsons, the 2013 version was a large disappointment-----but the tape of the '93 show was magnificent!!!
Unfortunately, the tape I bought was the last one available, so I was unable to get a second one for my second grandson, but they will share the one I got.  I just wanted to give them this as a remembrance of our '93 trip.
